docs.snippet: Staten Island Matters. The Castleton Board of Health, which continues to hold its meetings at the Burns Hotel, met yesterday morning at an early hour. The four gentlemen who look after the health of the town, were present, with their Health-Officer.
docs.lead_paragraph: Staten Island Matters. The Castleton Board of Health, which continues to hold its meetings at the Burns Hotel, met yesterday morning at an early hour. The four gentlemen who look after the health of the town, were present, with their Health-Officer.

docs.snippet: The Committee who presented a " statement of facts" to the meeting at Richmond on Monday afternoon, say in their address that " It was deemed advisable that such statement should be withheld until the passions and prejudices, excited by the...
docs.lead_paragraph: The Committee who presented a " statement of facts" to the meeting at Richmond on Monday afternoon, say in their address that " It was deemed advisable that such statement should be withheld until the passions and prejudices, excited by the exaggerated reports in circulation, had subsided, and they could obtain a dispassionate hearing.

docs.snippet: The Succession in the Third Congressional District. THE CAMPAIGN OPENED--LARGE DEMOCRATIC MASS MEETING--SPEECH OF THE HON. HIRAM WALBRIDGE. A large meeting of Democrats of the Third Congressional District was held in the open space in...
docs.lead_paragraph: The Succession in the Third Congressional District. THE CAMPAIGN OPENED--LARGE DEMOCRATIC MASS MEETING--SPEECH OF THE HON. HIRAM WALBRIDGE. A large meeting of Democrats of the Third Congressional District was held in the open space in Franklin-street, adjoining the Fifth Ward Museum Hotel, last evening.

docs.snippet: Launch of the Russian Frigate, Yesterday. The early hour fixed for the launch of this immense ship of war did not catch many people napping, for?? the wide-spread interest which was felt in the event, and the anxiety to witness it, drew one of the...
docs.lead_paragraph: Launch of the Russian Frigate, Yesterday. The early hour fixed for the launch of this immense ship of war did not catch many people napping, for?? the wide-spread interest which was felt in the event, and the anxiety to witness it, drew one of the largest crowds together that probably ever assembled upon any similar occasion.
